unnormalised: Arre, India vs. Pakistan toh 15/10/2024 ko hai, right? Hope it doesn't rain like the match on 02/09/2024; that was a wash-out!
normalised: Arre, India versus Pakistan toh fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four ko hai, right? Hope it doesn't rain like the match on second September two thousand and twenty four; that was a wash-out!
